Literature.Title: Activity of the streptogramin antibiotic etamycin against methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus
Literature.Author: Haste NM, Perera VR, Maloney KN, Tran DN, Jensen PR, Fenical W, Nizet V, Hensler ME

Literature.Title: Etamycin as a Novel Mycobacterium abscessus Inhibitor
Literature.Author: Hanh BTB, Kim TH, Park JW, Lee DG, Kim JS, Du YE, Yang CS, Oh DC, Jang J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 200(MIC=1-2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 600(MIC=1-4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 700(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=16µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes M1T1 5448(MIC=8µg/ml),Streptococcus agalactiae COH1(MIC=8µg/ml),Moraxella catarrhalis ATCC 25238(MIC=1µg/ml),Haemophilus influenzae ATCC 10211(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>256µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=>256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>256µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(no activity data),Mycobacterium abscessus subsp. abscessus CIP 104536T(MIC=8.2µM),Mycobacterium abscessus subsp. abscessus CIP 104536T(MIC90=28.3µM),Mycobacterium abscessus subsp. bolletii CIP 108541T(MIC50=5µM),Mycobacterium abscessus subsp. bolletii CIP 108541T(MIC90=16µM),Mycobacterium abscessus subsp. massiliense CIP 108297T(MIC50=1.8µM),Mycobacterium abscessus subsp. massiliense CIP 108297T(MIC90=4.3µM),Mycobacterium abscessus(MIC50=1.7-4.1µM),Mycobacterium abscessus(MIC90=4.3-10.3µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(10-20% Cytotoxicity=25µM)
